pullrequest.title: fix bad pose update with proper Pose algebra

content.raw:
Here's an example world that illustrates the problem. The pose of box_link_offset is not computed properly, which causes it to bounce and have jittery contact.
~~~
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<sdf version="1.4">
  <world name="default">
    <gui>
      <camera name="user_camera">
        <pose>996 1001 1.75  0 0.26 -0.28</pose>
      </camera>
    </gui>

    <include><uri>model://sun</uri></include>
    <include>
      <uri>model://ground_plane</uri>
      <pose>1000 1000 0  0 0 0</pose>
    </include>

    <model name="box_model_offset">
      <allow_auto_disable>false</allow_auto_disable>
      <pose>1000.0 999.0 1.0 0 0 0</pose>
      <link name="link">
        <inertial>
          <mass>40.0</mass>
        </inertial>
        <collision name="collision">
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>1 1 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </collision>
        <visual name="visual">
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>1 1 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </visual>
      </link>
    </model>

    <model name="box_link_offset">
      <allow_auto_disable>false</allow_auto_disable>
      <link name="link">
        <!-- link offset causes issue fixed by pull request #519 -->
        <pose>1000.0 1001.0 1.0 0 0 0</pose>
        <inertial>
          <mass>40.0</mass>
        </inertial>
        <collision name="collision">
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>1 1 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </collision>
        <visual name="visual">
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>1 1 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </visual>
      </link>
    </model>
  </world>
</sdf>
~~~
content.html:
Here's an example world that illustrates the problem. The pose of box_link_offset is not computed properly, which causes it to bounce and have jittery contact.

<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<sdf version="1.4">
  <world name="default">
    <gui>
      <camera name="user_camera">
        <pose>996 1001 1.75  0 0.26 -0.28</pose>
      </camera>
    </gui>

    <include><uri>model://sun</uri></include>
    <include>
      <uri>model://ground_plane</uri>
      <pose>1000 1000 0  0 0 0</pose>
    </include>

    <model name="box_model_offset">
      <allow_auto_disable>false</allow_auto_disable>
      <pose>1000.0 999.0 1.0 0 0 0</pose>
      <link name="link">
        <inertial>
          <mass>40.0</mass>
        </inertial>
        <collision name="collision">
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>1 1 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </collision>
        <visual name="visual">
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>1 1 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </visual>
      </link>
    </model>

    <model name="box_link_offset">
      <allow_auto_disable>false</allow_auto_disable>
      <link name="link">
        <!-- link offset causes issue fixed by pull request #519 -->
        <pose>1000.0 1001.0 1.0 0 0 0</pose>
        <inertial>
          <mass>40.0</mass>
        </inertial>
        <collision name="collision">
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>1 1 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </collision>
        <visual name="visual">
          <geometry>
            <box>
              <size>1 1 1</size>
            </box>
          </geometry>
        </visual>
      </link>
    </model>
  </world>
</sdf>
